Reviews.Content: Lovely villa resort: perfect honeymoon       Private villa with jacuzzi
Reviews.Author: Nyah82

Reviews.Content: Nice,quiet and relaxing Nice little boutique Hotel/villa complex.Quite a walk from the main beach at Sanur(30 mins),although another beach is nearby,approx 10 mins walk. We were looking for privacy,value for money and reasonable service.This place delivered that,the rooms were very spacious and clean,the jacuzzi provided a great cooloff after shopping and walking.Pros; Lovely setting,pool area is quiet and relaxing.Staff very friendly,very comfy beds,spacious rooms.Clean towels and linen.Cons; Food in the Restaurant was average at best..Noisy road adjacent the villa we stayed in(Jasmin) and renovations next door(cant be helped)Tip; try a meal and drink at The Bali International Cricket Club,cheap and tasty.just 5 mins walk up Danau Poso towards main area of Sanur from the Villa complex. Pick up some Mozzie killers at the local shops.We bought the plug in type and had little problems.
Reviews.Author: RMDJakarta

Reviews.Content: Perfect Honeymoon Location Perfect honeymoon, friendly people, clean and nice villas. Privacy garanteed.
Reviews.Author: driesbe

Reviews.Content: Great Luxury for the price.       Hotel - Beach Area
Reviews.Author: GriderX

Reviews.Content: Fantastic value- affordable luxury I loved this resort and we holidayed for over a month - our longest holiday ever!The resort is small and intimate -only 18 villas- no children seemed evident.The plunge pool (you get your very own private one) was huge and bigger than most backyard swimming pools.Your courtyard is entirely private - great for sunbathing on the lounger and the outside shower was a bonus and hot!The bed was one of the most comfortable on our whole stay away.This was our most expensive accommodation while we were away but we had used timeshare exchanges.Considering Bali / thailand are cheap we thought it was excellent value and the luxury we had we could not afford else where.We only stayed 2 nights and If I were to go back to Bali again I would stay here at least a week.It was heavenly.
Reviews.Author: oysterfiend

Reviews.Content: A Lovely Week We have just spent a week staying at these villas. We had a villa with the 5m x 3m (approx) plunge pool and enjoyed being able to take a dip whenever we pleased. The grounds and central pool which boasts waterfalls and rock pools are beautiful. We were so impressed that we nominated the gardener as the employee we wanted acknowledged by the hotel this month. The staff, as always were friendly and helpful and our room was always kept to a high standard of cleanliness. For us a few changes would improve the overall experience even more. We would love to see some steps put in the plunge pools to make entry less of a splashing affair. We also would like to see a better choice of tv channels as most were either in indonesian or japanese. The inclusion of a dvd and cd player would also be great - having some music playing was what we missed in our beautiful private courtyard. Finally, making the indoor bathroom more private, (it is very open, especially if you have room service or guests visit when you are using the bathroom) would be a great improvement. Overall this was a lovely week and I would recommend these villas in Sanur if you are looking to get away from the bigger hotels.
Reviews.Author: SOOz-Trip

Reviews.Content: Loved it! Romantic and intimate villas       main pool
Reviews.Author: diormanolo

Reviews.Content: A Beautiful  We're not long back off honeymoon, where we spent an amazing 2 weeks at the Parigatas Villas Resort in Sanur.We loved the resort and were very sad to leave after our 2 weeks there. The staff are very helpful and friendly, the food delicious and the grounds amazing full of tropical plants and flowers. It has a very private and personal feel to it (only 18 Villas) and is only a 2 minute walk away from Sanur Beach where you'll find the Parigata Beach Club.We stayed in the Executive Villa which has an outdoor living area, it's own pool with jacuzzi and an outdoor shower. We were impressed with our private plunge pool as it was larger than we expected and had a jacuzzi built in, fantastic after a busy day sightseeing. Inside the villa was well maintained and tastefully decorated with a mosquito net over the bed, essential for someone who gets bitten all to easily!We managed to also have a look in one of the standard villas and found them to be smaller versions of our villa with the exception of no outside living area and just a jacuzzi instead of a plunge pool, but if you're on a smaller budget they are excellent value for money.The main pool area was beautiful and had a poolside bar that served an array of drinks and snacks. Breakfast was of a good standard with plenty to chose from and is served in an outside dining area overlooking the gardens.There are plenty of good restaurant near the villas, our favourite was Casa Luna, the food and service exceptional and they have Balinese dancing on certain nights of the week.
Reviews.Author: RachyPea

Reviews.Content: Lovely, intimate resort!       Arriving at our villa
